personalInfo.family: Wife, Meredith, Children: Reese and Gavin

tourBios.carHigh:
2012: Missed the cut in his first 11 starts then shot four consecutive sub-70 rounds to T9 at the Utah Championship. It was not only his first Web.com Tour top-10 finish, it was also his first made cut. 

2011: Missed the cut at the Miccosukee Championship, his only career Web.com Tour start.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2000 Illinois State individual championship, while helping his team at Rochester High School win the team title...Won the Missouri Valley Conference Championship...Was a four-time All-Missouri Valley Conference player.
tourBios.personal: Played on the Gateway Tour (2005-2008), Hooters Tour (2009), eGolf Tour (2009-2011) and Minor League Golf Tour (2005-2011)...Wife Meredith (Ward) Anderson played on the LPGA and Futures Tour...Biggest thrill outside of golf was the birth of his daughter...Golf course he would most like to play is Augusta National and St. Andrews...Never travels without his iPod...Superstitions include starting a round with three tees, a divot tool and an angel coin in his pocket...Drives a Hyundai Santa Fe...Favorite college teams are Illinois State Redbirds and the Illinois Fighting Illini. Favorite pro teams are the Chicago Bears and the Chicago Cubs. Favorite TV shows are "Pawn Stars" and "Modern Family." Favorite movies are the "Back to the Future" series. Favorite music groups are Twista, ZPAC and Boyz II Men. Favorite athlete to watch was Michael Jordan. Favorite vacation spot is St. Lucia. Favorite app is Bejeweled 2. Oldest club in his bag is a 3-wood (four years)...Bucket list includes going on a safari in South Africa.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T9th in 2012 at the Utah Championship Presented by Utah Sports Commission.
